Class MedianFilter

java.lang.Object
MedianFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParallelMedianFilter, SerialMedianFilter
public class MedianFilter extends Object
Facilitates input of raw data, mathematical functions involved in the processing thereof and output of the processed data. Super class for SerialMedianFilter and ParallelMedianFilter.
